name: 胡念祖
objective:
本課程主要是介紹 H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識 H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
This course mainly introduces the theory of H∞ and how to utilize the mathematical tool to design the H∞ controller. Besides, the physical meaning and the comparison with others control methods are also will be introduced in this course.
